mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AT_COMPLAIN( CP_CODE, CSR_IDENTIFER, CN_FROM, CN_TYPE, CN_THEME, CN_CONTENT, CN_OPT, CN_INQUIRE, CN_RESULT, CN_PRINCIPAL, CN_STATUS, OPERATOR, REMARK ) VALUES( #{cpCode}, #{csrIdentifer}, #{cnFrom}, #{cnType}, #{cnTheme}, #{cnContent}, #{cnOpt}, #{cnInquire}, #{cnResult}, #{cnPrincipal}, #{cnStatus}, #{operator}, #{remark} )
mapper.select: SELECT c.ID as id, CP_CODE as cpCode, CSR_IDENTIFER as csrIdentifer, CN_FROM as cnFrom, CN_TYPE as cnType, CN_THEME as cnTheme, CN_CONTENT as cnContent, CN_OPT as cnOpt, CN_INQUIRE as cnInquire, CN_RESULT as cnResult, CN_PRINCIPAL as cnPrincipal, CN_STATUS as cnStatus, OPERATOR as operator, CREATE_TIME as createTime, UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, REMARK as remark FROM AT_COMPLAIN c WHERE c.ID=#{id}

SELECT c.ID as id, CP_CODE as cpCode, CSR_IDENTIFER as csrIdentifer, CN_FROM as cnFrom, CN_TYPE as cnType, CN_THEME as cnTheme, CN_CONTENT as cnContent, CN_OPT as cnOpt, CN_INQUIRE as cnInquire, CN_RESULT as cnResult, CN_PRINCIPAL as cnPrincipal, CN_STATUS as cnStatus, OPERATOR as operator, CREATE_TIME as createTime, UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, REMARK as remark FROM AT_COMPLAIN c ORDER BY createTime
